channel.description: Latest Financial News for CPI CARD GROUP INC

item.title: CPI Card Group and Proxama Announce Strategic Relationship
CPI Card Group and Proxama Announce Strategic Relationship
item.description: [Business Wire] - Proxama PLC , the international digital and mobile commerce company specialising in end-to-end payment solutions for card issuers and processors, is delighted to announce a joint agreement with CPI Card Group , a global leader in financial and EMV chip card production and related services, to deliver innovative financial and payments products to CPI’s growing North American customer base.

item.title: CPI Card Group, Inc. breached its 50 day moving average in a Bullish Manner : PNT-CA : January 4, 2017
Should You Buy CPI Card Group Inc (PMTS)?
CPI Card Group Appoints New Chief Financial Officer
item.description: [Business Wire] - CPI Card Group , a global leader in financial and EMV® chip card production and related services, today announced the appointment of Lillian Etzkorn as its Chief Financial Officer, effective January 1, 2017, succeeding David Brush who will be ending his service as CFO on December 31, 2016.

item.title: ETFs with exposure to CPI Card Group, Inc. : December 12, 2016
Falling Earnings Estimates Signal Weakness Ahead for CPI Card Group (PMTS)
Florence Bank Enhances Card Programs Using CPI Card Group’s MYCA™ Software Platform
item.description: [Business Wire] - CPI Card Group , a global leader in financial and EMV® chip card production and related services, today announced that Massachusetts-based Florence Bank has implemented the Company’s MYCA card creation and ordering system to bolster its card programs for consumers.

item.title: CPI Card Group, Inc. :PNT-CA: Earnings Analysis: Q3, 2016 By the Numbers : November 23, 2016

item.description: [at noodls] - Initial Effort of Over 2 Million Cards Provides New Convenience to Customers, Distributing Cards Through Gift Card Malls and Lottery Retailers LITTLETON, Colo.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- CPI Card Group (Nasdaq:PMTS) ...

item.title: CPI Card Group-Canada Inc. Selected by Ontario Lottery and Gaming Corporation as Manufacturer for First-Ever Canadian Lottery Gift Card Program
item.description: [Business Wire] - CPI Card Group , a global leader in financial and EMV® chip card production and related services, today announced that CPI Card Group in Toronto, Ontario was selected by the Ontario Lottery & Gaming Corporation to produce more than 2.4 million lottery gift cards.

item.title: Top Analyst Upgrades and Downgrades After Election: IBM, Qualcomm, Valeant, Yum China, CSX, DeVry and More
CPI Card Group Sees Strong Market Adoption of Card@Once® Instant Issuance Solution, Surpasses 1,100 US Bank and Credit Union Customers
item.description: [Business Wire] - CPI Card Group , a global leader in financial and EMV® chip card production and related services, today announced that more than 1,100 banks and credit unions are actively leveraging its SaaS-based Card@Once® instant issuance solution to successfully provide in-branch, instant issuance of EMV-enabled debit and credit cards to their cardholders.

CPI Card Group Inc. Reports Third Quarter 2016 Results
